title: Lemongrass Chili Chicken
directions: Place chicken in a big bowl together with all the marinade ingredients. Combine. Cover with cling film, place in the fridge. Leave to marinate for at least 1 hour or overnight
For the lemongrass chili paste - place all ingredients in a blender and process to form a uniform paste
Heat oil in a wok over medium/high heat. Fry paste for 3 - 4 minutes. Add chicken; cook stirring until it changes color
Add sugar, stock, soy & fish sauces, green beans and spring onions.
Cook covered, stirring occasionally for 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked.
Top with roasted peanuts and serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: 750g (1+1/2 lb) skinless boneless chicken breasts, cubed
7 spring onions (scallions) chopped in 2.5cm - 1in pieces (reserve some slices of the green part for decoration)
35g (1.2 oz) fresh lemongrass (white/light green part only, first couple of tougher layers removed) sliced
1 - 2 long red chilis, deseeded & chopped (mine where super-mild, adjust to your liking)
